thread.title: Great Weekend Stay
thread.title_full: Great Weekend Stay - Review of Park International Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: LesPeupliers
title: Great Weekend Stay
text: I have just returned home after a 3 night stay with friends at the Park. We were all very happy with our stay here. The staff are the best thing; friendly, helpful and courteous, they couldn't do enough for us (I hope that the management look after them). Cleanliness is 5 star. We booked 3 twin rooms. I stayed in room (number 62) at the back of the hotel. Very quiet and overlooked a row of mews houses. Didn't hear any traffic noise from the Cromwell Road. Breakfast buffet was excellent & had a wide range of hot & cold breakfast items to suit all nationalities & preferences. Ideally located for visiting central London, it is just a 10 minute walk to Gloucester Road tube station. A big thank you to all of the staff who made our stay so enjoyable (from the 6 girls travelling from France) . I will definately stay here again on my next trip to London.
